#Load packages
```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
```

#Part 1: Factor management

##Drop Oceania

```{r}
glimpse(gapminder)
```


```{r}
noO <- gapminder %>%
  filter(continent != "Oceania") %>% 
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
glimpse(gapminder)
```

##Remove unused factor levels

```{r}
dropO <- noO %>% 
  mutate(continent = fct_drop(continent))
glimpse(dropO)
```
